World Climate[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]View the world's climate and weather.
World Climate[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]View the world's climate and weather.

Deforestation Level: {1_Level}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{2_Description}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Due to this level of deforestation, the rate of global temperature increase as CO2 is emitted has been altered by {3_CO2Mod}%.
[NEWLINE]Lowland tiles will flood at or below:[NEWLINE]{1_Name}
[NEWLINE]Lowland tiles will be submerged at or below:[NEWLINE]{1_Name}

STORM EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- One of four possible storms (blizzard, dust storm, hurricane, or tornado) spawns based upon the terrain at the storm's origin.[NEWLINE]- Storms then move across the map for two more turns, causing damage to buildings and improvements and possibly adding fertility to affected tiles.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As the global temperature rises from greenhouse gas emissions into the atmosphere, the chance that a storm will occur increases. Using cleaner sources of energy reduces the global temperature increase and thus mitigates the chance of storms.

RIVER FLOOD EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- Floodplain tiles along the affected River will flood, possibly adding fertility.[NEWLINE]- Buildings and improvements on flooded tiles may become pillaged or destroyed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Prevent Flood damage by building a Dam or the Great Bath wonder on the affected River.

VOLCANO EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- Non-mountain tiles adjacent to the eruption will gain the Volcanic Soil feature, possibly adding fertility.[NEWLINE]- Buildings and improvements on those tiles may become pillaged or destroyed.

DROUGHT EVENT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When event occurs:[NEWLINE]- Farm, Camp, Plantation, and Pasture improvements, as well as Mekewap, Outback Station, and Cahokia Mound improvements are pillaged.[NEWLINE]- These improvements cannot be rebuilt until the Drought ends.[NEWLINE]- All tiles affected by the Drought yield 1 less [Icon_Food] Food than usual.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Build an Aqueduct, Dam, or Stepwell in your city to prevent the [Icon_Food] Food loss from Drought. Drought targets areas that are devoid of all Features. Keep some Woods, Rainforest, or Marsh near your cities to lessen the chance that Drought will strike.

POLAR ICE MELT[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Climate change impacts the number of Polar Ice tiles lost.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Melted Polar Ice tiles may open advantageous naval passageways but also contribute to rising sea levels.
Polar Ice melt recently updated due to climate change.
SEA LEVEL RISE[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Sea Levels have risen {1_Num} meters as a result of climate change.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Rising Sea Levels cause more and more tiles to be subjected to coastal flooding.
Sea Level recently updated due to climate change.
Next sea level change expected in {1_Turns} turns.
Next melt of polar ice expected in {1_Turns} turns.
Total CO2 emissions adjusted by {1_Modifier} percent based on the deforestation level of the planet.
Climate change has intensified, reaching the next phase.
Your empire has expended {1_Number} {2_Resource} in the past turn, adding {3_CO2Number : plural 1?{3_CO2Number} unit; other?{3_CO2Number} units;} of CO2 to the atmosphere.
You had to be there! It was amazing! They totally melted my face! Nothing could ever top that! I am totally going to buy every album they ever make from now on and see every concert they give.
The last note of the final triumphant song resounds and merges with the screams and cheers of the crowd. Everyone heads home happy, humming the band's best tunes.
The best part about tonight's show is going to be six months from now, when everyone says they're a fan, and I can be like, "Yeah, but I liked them before they got popular."
We went because of the main band, but the opening band was way better than I expected. I bought a shirt and an album. You should give it a listen.
It was a masterful and heartfelt performance, but for the band, a bittersweet moment. The members are already planning new and separate projects.
Life on tour is hard, and the crowds aren't as big or as enthusiastic as they used to be. But the worst was the people there enjoying the show ironically. Time to hang it up.
This [ICON_Tourism] Tourism generated from this show has been applied against the player who owns this concert venue.
Increases in album sales boost the base [ICON_Tourism] Tourism this band will earn from future concerts.
Band may select one of the randomly offered promotions to improve their abilities before their next show.
Gaining a level will increase this band's chance of a favorable result in future concerts.
Your band needs a name before it can go on stage.
This Emergency targets an unmet player.
Keeping units in the Target's territory
Keeping Religious units in the Target city's territory
Generating [ICON_GREATPERSON] Great People Points Per Turn
"Let us prove which nation is truly the home of the best and brightest!"
Our brilliant [ICON_GREATPERSON] Great People lead the way. Which of us can show the greatest support for their native luminaries?
"Space is the next great adventure. Let us make the leap together!"
We must undertake a project to construct an international Space Station, combining the best efforts of all nations' science and engineering fields.
"We need not compete with arms. Let us instead see who can best who at the Games."
Our best athletes will compete against the world's best. Which nation will take home the gold?
"We all share this planet. For our children and their children after them, we must protect it."
We all must do our part to reduce mankind's carbon footprint. Those who do best will be thanked by the generations to come.
Having CO2 emissions much lower than the biggest CO2 polluter
Completing the Decommission Coal Power Plant project
Completing the Decommission Oil Power Plant project
Completing the Decommission Nuclear Power Plant project
"Art transcends nationality, blessing us all. Let us honor those who give us glimpses of heaven and hell."
Sweden is awarding a Nobel Prize for Literature. Let's prove ourselves the most artful, and win this prestigious prize.
Generating [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Artist, and [ICON_GreatMusician] Musician Points.
"Study is what propels mankind into the future. Let us honor those giants on whose shoulders we stand."
Sweden is awarding a Nobel Prize for Physics. Let's prove ourselves the most scientifically minded, and win this prestigious prize.
Generating [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer, [ICON_GreatScientist] Scientist, and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Merchant Points.
+2 Random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and +50% on District Production.
"There is nothing so deserving of honor as a remarkable pursuit of peace."
Sweden is awarding a Nobel Prize for Peace. Let's prove ourselves the most peaceful, and win this prestigious prize.
"We cannot let other civilizations fall before the onslaught of nature. One for all, and all for one."
{TargetName} was recently ravaged by a natural disaster. Our assistance in their recuperation will gain us prestige in the eyes of the World Congress.
Sending gifts of [ICON_Gold] Gold to the Target.
Generating CO2 will reduce your score.
Being at War with the Target will reduce your score.
"We must help those targeted by unrestrained aggression."
{TargetName} is the target of an unjustified war by a power against whom they have many Grievances. Our assistance will help restore peace.

The Members will compete to see who can get the highest score within [ICON_Turn] {Turns} Turns.
The Members are competing to see who can get the highest score.
If the Members complete all objectives before time runs out:
When time runs out, Members will be rewarded based on their scores:
Only the Member with the highest score will receive:
Members within the top 25% of scores will receive:
Members within the next 25% of scores will receive:
Members with no score, or who are in the bottom 50% of scores, will receive nothing.
Members with no score will not receive rewards.

Suleiman's vizier {LOC_GOVERNOR_IBRAHIM_NAME}, is a Military and Diplomacy focused governor. In addition to having a unique promotion tree, Ibrahim is the only Governor that can be assigned to another civilization's capital as well as any domestic city. He is well suited for influencing military operations but is also a skilled diplomat, strengthening relationships with friendly civilizations and easing tensions with rivals.
+20% [ICON_Production] Production to all military units in the city.
All friendly units fighting within the city's territory gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.
Grants all units within 10 tiles of the City Center +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking defensible districts.
When established in an allied foreign [ICON_Capital] Capital, your Alliance Points with the owner increase an extra .5 per turn.
When established in a foreign [ICON_Capital] Capital, [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances from the city owner against you are reduced by 1 more per turn.
When established in a foreign [ICON_Capital] Capital, none of the owner's cities exert Loyalty pressure on your cities.
All Offshore Wind Farms, Solar Farms, Wind Farms, Geothermal Plants, and Hydroelectric Dams in this city receive +2 [ICON_POWER] Power and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
This city receives +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each unimproved feature. Tiles adjacent to unimproved features receive +1 Appeal in this city.

To achieve a [COLOR:DiplomaticLabelCS]DIPLOMATIC[ENDCOLOR] victory, be the first to accumulate the target number of Diplomatic Points. Whenever you vote for the target and option combination that passes for a World Congress Resolution, you will earn one Diplomatic Point. You can earn additional points through the Diplomatic Victory Proposal in the World Congress, by generating the highest score in Aid Requests, or by completing the Seasteads Tech, the Global Warming Mitigation Civic, or the Statue of Liberty, Mahabodhi Temple, or Potala Palace Wonders.
Your ancient and eternal commitment to a shared peace will be the foundation of the world of tomorrow.
While established in a city-state, accumulate its Strategic resources. When suzerain receive double the amount of accumulated strategic resources.
Enemy Spies operate at 3 levels below normal in this city.
This cityâs improvements, buildings, and districts cannot be damaged by Environmental Effects.
+2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing for every Neighborhood and Aqueduct district in this city. +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Canal and Dam district in this city.
[COLOR_RED]The location of this city is not yet known.
[COLOR_RED]You are at war with this civilization.
Raze city clearing it and all its districts and buildings from the map. This option must be chosen the turn the city is conquered.
Keeping this Free City will not cause any [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances with other players.
Liberating this city will earn you {1_Favor} [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor.

Keeping this city will give this opponent {1_Grievances} [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against us.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances will be either refunded or doubled at the end of the war depending on whether or not you keep the city.
Keeping this opponent's final city will give all major powers {1_Grievances} [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against us (though these are reduced for other powers at war with this eliminated foe).
Razing this city will give this opponent {1_Grievances} [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against us!
Razing this opponent's final city will give all major powers {1_Grievances} [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances against us (though these are reduced for other powers at war with this eliminated foe).
My people will settle where they please![NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Generates [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]25[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances[SIZE_18]
Apologies, I will look elsewhere in the future.[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Gain 30 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor[SIZE_18]
I apologize, I will cease these operations at once.[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Gain 30 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor[SIZE_18]
You cannot lay claim to history. I will dig where I please.[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Generates [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]25[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances[SIZE_18]
Apologies, I will move my Archaeologists elsewhere.[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Gain 30 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor[SIZE_18]
If it is God's will that your people believe in our ways, who am I to stop it?[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Generates [COLOR_Civ6DarkRed]25[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_STAT_GRIEVANCE] Grievances[SIZE_18]
I'm sorry, I thought my people would be welcome. I was mistaken.[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]Gain 30 [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor[SIZE_18]

This is Diplomatic Favor, a currency for buying votes.
SPECIAL SESSION OF THE WORLD CONGRESS
The World Congress is currently in session.
The World Congress is currently in special session.
The World Congress is now in Session! Each World Leader must vote on the Proposals currently on the floor.
Once everyone's votes are submitted, winning Proposals are enacted until the next meeting of the World Congress.
The World Congress has been summoned to a Special Session to consider Discussions.
Once everyone's votes are submitted, passed Discussions are enacted, beginning the associated Emergencies.
THE WORLD CONGRESS: NOT IN SESSION

You must decide how best to exploit the opportunities available to you in World Congress. Wield your accumulated [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor to vote on Proposals that are important to you and your people.
Recent events demand the attention of the World Congress. Wield your accumulated [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor to vote on Discussions that are important to you and your people.
Are you sure you want to submit these Proposals?
THE WORLD CONGRESS: IN SPECIAL SESSION
THE WORLD CONGRESS: SPECIAL SESSION COMPLETE!
Use [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor to Vote on these Discussions.

Vote for the target that you would like this Resolution to affect, and which effect should be implemented. Your first vote is free.
Vote against this Discussion. If the Discussion passes, you will be targeted by this Emergency. Your first vote is free.
Vote against this Discussion. Even if the Discussion passes, you will not be involved in the resulting Scored Competition. Your first vote is free.
Vote for this Discussion. If the Discussion passes, you will join the resulting Scored Competition. Your first vote is free.
In the event of a tie, the target for which Civilizations spent the greatest percentage of their [ICON_Favor] Diplomatic Favor when voting will be the winner.
You must submit at least one Proposal.
You must vote on all submitted Proposals.

A session of World Congress will begin in {1_Turns} {1_Turns : plural 1?turn; other?turns;}.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Congress may also be summoned for a Special Session by choosing from Available Proposals. As crises occur across the world, new Proposals will become available.
"{TargetName} has captured {OldCityName}. We must restore its independence."
"{TargetName} has converted {OldCityName} to {NewReligion}. We must eradicate this new faith."
"{TargetName} has betrayed {OldPlayerName}. We must punish their treachery."
"{TargetName} has captured {OldCityName}. We must resist their aggression."
"{TargetName} has used a nuclear weapon. We must punish this despicable act."
"{TargetName} was ravaged by a Natural Disaster. We should help them recover."
"{TargetName} is targetted by an aggressive enemy. We should fund their defense."
"We all share this planet. For our children and their children after them, we must protect it."
"Athleticism need not be proven in battle. Let us prove who is strongest through sport."
"Which nation has the best creatives and inventors? Let us see who has the brightest minds."
"Space is too large for any one civilization. Let us work together to explore this unknown frontier."
"Sweden wishes to acknowledge the most peaceful nation. We shall see which of us that is."
"Sweden wishes to acknowledge superb penmanship. We shall see who produces the best literature."
"Sweden wishes to acknowledge scientific leadership. We shall see who best fosters the sciences."

Your manager expects to generate {1_Tourism} [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism from this venue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]There is a {2_Death}% chance these rockers will make this their final gig and retire after playing here.
Must be on a tile owned by a different major civilization than you.
Requires a valid target location. Possible locations include Wonders, Districts with one of the required buildings, or a special target allowed by one of the band's promotions.
The same tile is not allowed to be played multiple times.

Improvement that unlocks with Masonry and must be built on Desert, Desert Hills or Desert Floodplains. +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Receives additional yields from adjacent districts. +1 [ICON_Food] Food if adjacent to a city center. For all other districts that award adjacency bonuses: +1 of the appropriate yield if that district is adjacent.
Grants a free Builder. All Builders can build 1 extra improvement. Must be built on Desert (including Desert Floodplains) without Hills.
+2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +1 [ICON_Production] Production on all Desert tiles for this city (non-Floodplains). Must be built on Desert or Desert Floodplains without Hills.
[NEWLINE][COLOR_RED]Increase Access Level to view this city's details[ENDCOLOR]

Suzerain Diplomacy Bonus:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]You gain a base of +1 [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Favor every turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]The city-state follows you into war and peace with other players.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]City-state lands become friendly territory. Your units can move there, heal there, and upgrade there.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]Your Builder units may improve city-state tiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]See 3 tiles around the city-state.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]Can pay [ICON_Gold] Gold to temporarily take control of the city-state's military.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bolt]Gain ownership of all the city-state's resources.
Can receive additional yields from environmental effects.
To achieve a [COLOR:ResScienceLabelCS]SCIENCE[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must accomplish 4 major milestones:
Exoplanet Expedition has traveled {1_LightYearsTraveled} / {2_LightYearsTotalNeeded} light {2_LightYearsTotalNeeded : plural 1?year; other?years;}.
Exoplanet Expedition is traveling {1_LightYearsPerTurn} light {1_LightYearsPerTurn : plural 1?year; other?years;} per turn.
Help the Exoplanet Expedition travel {1_NumLightYears} light years.
{1_YieldAmount} {2_YieldIconString} {3_YieldName} from landmarks along the path that make trade easier (water tiles, Railroads, Canals, Mountain Tunnels, and your [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Posts).
